author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: Proper handling of page break between normally broken parts and the parts that need to be balanced. (multi-column layout, fixes multi-column2a)

author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: Corrected the calculation of the full length of the section to be broken. Could lead to strange results.
Own private logger for easier debugging.

author: rwatler
msg: - replace 'back' menu with new 'breadcrumbs' menu in tigris decorators, commenting out menu example
- use menu titles for 'back' and 'breadcrumbs' menus to allow decorator placement of title text instead of using inline separators
- expand decorator include links macro to allow specification of title positioning, breadcrumb style, and delimiter text

author: jeremias
msg: Regression test for special case of multi-column2.xml.
